title: Fireworks With Geraldo (Ep 1572)
description:
I had another blow-up with Geraldo last night on Fox. In this episode, I discuss the fireworks about January 6th, and the latest coronavirus misinformation campaign from the Biden administration. 

News Picks:

The head of the anti-free speech group “Media Matters” is a virulent bigot.


Chris Cuomo loses his mind as GOP congressman calmly makes the case for coronavirus sanity.

Medical schools are now denying biological sex. 


Mask madness is back!


Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
